Design-01.Description: Design Style 01 is a Solid stripe, one color style.

Design-02.Description: Design Style 02 is a Solid stripe with a pinstripe accent. The 'accent' (cut away in image) can be cut away, or an alternate accent color.

Design-03.Description: Design Style 03 is a Strobed stripe style and is a single color.

Design-04.Description: Design Style 04 is an outlined stripe style and is a single color.
